document.full_text: world number one caroline wozniacki defeated serbia's jelena jankovic 6-4 6-4 saturday to set up a final meeting with russian elena vesnina at the family circle cup.
document.title: wozniacki to face vesnina in charleston final
lines_and_colors: world number one caroline wozniacki defeated serbia's jelena jankovic 6-4 6-4 saturday to set up a final meeting with russian elena vesnina at the family circle cup.
